A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was very entertained and I saw the people around me in the theater with wide-eyes and grins at all the right moments. I’m not sure what is considered a reasonable expectation for a film amongst its more vocal critics. While a fan of the genre and Star Wars in general I don’t care about canon or expect any film to be be something specific. What it has continued to do is get me to care about the characters\, where they’ve been and where they are going. Most films have their weak spots and The Last Jedi is no exception\, but the good outweighed the bad. It was well worth my time in the theater and I will definitely be coming back for the next installment of the saga.
